text: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is an American food reality television show created by Guy Fieri. It is shown on the Food Network and follows American cook Guy Fieri as he searches for America's best diners, drive-ins and dives. Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:2006 American television series debuts Category:Food Network Category:English-language television programs
title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
